data.eml:eml: A revision of Xylopia L. (Annonaceae): the species of Tropical Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Johnson, David M., Murray, Nancy A. (2018): A revision of Xylopia L. (Annonaceae): the species of Tropical Africa. PhytoKeys 97: 1-252, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.97.20975, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.97.20975
